content.question:
You will participate in a simulated conversation. Each time it is your turn to speak, you will have 20 seconds to record. You should respond as fully and as appropriately as possible. There will be four times when it is your turn to speak.

You will have a conversation with Hiroshi Morimura, your friend, about a school project.

Prompt 1
